s: Introducing Luna, Amazon’s cloud gaming service where it’s easy to play great games on devices you already own. No waiting for lengthy downloads—just play.

2 weeks ago - Amazon Luna is a cloud gaming platform developed and operated by Amazon. The platform has integration with Twitch and is available on Windows, Mac, Amazon Fire TV, iOS (as a progressive web app) as well as Android. Games and channels from brands such as Ubisoft+ and Jackbox Games are accessed ...
Introducing Luna, Amazon’s cloud gaming service where it’s easy to play great games on devices you already own. No waiting for lengthy downloads—just play.
You can play Luna on your Windows PC, MAC, Fire TV, Fire Tablet, iPad, iPhone, Chromebooks, select Android phones, supported Samsung Smart TVs and LG Smart TVs.
Get help using and troubleshooting common issues with Amazon Luna.
Explore a wide range of our Amazon Luna selection. Find top brands, exclusive offers, and unbeatable prices on eBay. Shop now for fast shipping and easy returns!

s: To play games on Luna, install the Luna app on a compatible device or use a supported web browser.

t: Subscribe to Luna+ | Amazon Luna Cloud Gaming
s: Luna+ gives you access to a library of games across genres. Play 100+ games on devices you already own. $9.99/month, cancel anytime on Amazon Luna Cloud Gaming

t: What is Amazon Luna? Cloud gaming reimagined
s: January 4, 2025 - Explore Amazon Luna, a next-gen cloud gaming experience on your existing devices—no costly hardware needed. Experience seamless play with Luna cloud gaming.

t: Amazon Official Site: Amazon Luna Controller
s: The Luna Controller was designed for cloud gaming. Its Cloud Direct technology connects directly to Amazon’s custom game servers for lower latency gaming.
